text: The 58.com 2015 Chinese Football Association China League关于正确使用2015中甲联赛冠名名称的通知 is the twelfth season of the China League One, the second tier of the Chinese football league pyramid, since its establishment in 2004. The league title sponsor is 58.com.中甲获2015-19年冠名权 内蒙古卫视或成转播平台 == Teams == A total of 16 teams will contest the league, including 11 sides from the 2014 season, two relegated from the 2014 Chinese Super League and three promoted from the 2014 China League Two. === Team changes === ==== To League One ==== Teams relegated from 2014 Chinese Super League * Dalian Aerbin * Harbin Yiteng Teams promoted from 2014 China League Two * Jiangxi Liansheng * Taiyuan Zhongyou Jiayi * Guizhou Zhicheng ==== From League One ==== Teams promoted to 2015 Chinese Super League * Chongqing Lifan * Shijiazhuang Yongchang Dissolved entries * Shenyang Zhongze * Shaanxi Wuzhou（Guangdong Sunray Cave） Teams relegated to 2015 China League Two and Dissolved entries * Chengdu Tiancheng === Name changes === * Guangdong Sunray Cave F.C. moved to the city of Xi'an and changed their name to Shaanxi Wuzhou F.C. in December 2014.新陕足亮相更名陕西五洲 新赛季无过严成绩指标 * Beijing Baxy F.C. changed their name to Beijing Enterprises Group F.C. in December 2014.关于北京八喜联合竞技足球俱乐部有限公司主要股权转让并更名的公示 * Taiyuan Zhongyou Jiayi F.C. moved to the city of Hohhot and changed their name to Nei Mongol Zhongyou F.C. in January 2015.关于太原中优嘉怡足球俱乐部有限公司工商迁移并更名的公示 * Shenzhen Ruby F.C. changed their name to Shenzhen F.C. in January 2015.关于深圳红钻主要股权转让并更名的公示 ==Clubs== ===Stadiums and Locations=== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="font-size:95%" ! 5 October 2015 http://www.delo.si/sport/nogomet/spanski-in-angleski-prvak-na- kolenih.html | Dragan Stančić (caretaker) | 5 October 2015 |- |} ===Foreign players=== Restricting the number of foreign players strictly to three per CL1 team. A team could use three foreign players on the field each game.
